https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qO3wl8M4EpUylkb62s3G5Rsmy1S.jpg Children of War is a movie based on the true events of the 1971 Genocide. Can we, in search of power, become animals? A genocide; neglected! The first use of rape as a weapon of war; undocumented! The lives of millions; unaccounted! The culprits; unpunished! Children of War
